attributes.action: Give people in hull the right to chose who provides internet/phone etc
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
people in hull have no choice who provides their internet/phone etc. Karoo/Kingston Communication say anyone is welcome into hull to offer their services, but then make it impossible by the high rates they charge for using their equipment, cables etc. 
We feel we have the same right as anyone else in uk to all the internet deals/phones deals etc...but are being victimised!!!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
